short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mindfully Hides YouTube end cards so you don't miss the climax part of the music video or movie clip

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't you hate when YouTube puts those annoying cards at the end of every music video or a movie clip? Mindfully will automatically hide all end cards from YouTube so you won't miss your favorite scene!
